items.sentence: You should tell Tom that Mary wants him to teach her how to do that.
Do you have any idea how many people are coming to tonight\'s party?
I don\'t have much experience driving on the right side of the road.
Even though I asked Tom not to do that, he\'s going to do it anyway.
Do you think that Tom would like to go camping with us next weekend?
I wonder how Tom used to do that all the time without getting bored.
Let me ask you something, Tom. Do you think we really have a chance?
I can\'t figure out how to export my email addresses to a text file.
I can\'t go with you next weekend, but I can the weekend after next.
This food will just go to waste if you don\'t take it home with you.
I\'d like to read the newspaper as soon as you\'re finished with it.
I don\'t know why Tom doesn\'t want to go sailing with us next week.
Tom and Mary are twins, but their personalities are quite different.
Tom probably wouldn\'t have died if he\'d been wearing his seatbelt.
Everyone was talking at once, so I couldn\'t get a word in edgewise.
Your wife wouldn\'t be happy if she found out about this, would she?
Do you think that Tom would like to go fishing with us next weekend?
Tom wouldn\'t have passed the test if Mary hadn\'t helped him study.
Tom\'s favorite saying is "You can\'t put two saddles on one horse."
Tom knew that he wouldn\'t be able to do what Mary wanted him to do.
Tom said he didn\'t know that Mary couldn\'t speak French very well.
Tom knew that Mary thought John and Alice were going to get married.
As soon as Tom walked into the room, everyone started to look happy.
Tom asked Mary how much she\'d paid for the sofa in her living room.
I\'m going over to Tom\'s house now to tell him about what happened.
Tom\'s parents have decided to punish Tom for staying out all night.
We won\'t have another chance to do that anytime in the near future.
Tom explained everything to Mary, but I don\'t think she understood.
Mary was dressed all in white, except for a pink ribbon in her hair.
Tom wanted to drive, but since he was drunk, Mary wouldn\'t let him.
Tom couldn\'t tell me because he\'d promised Mary that he wouldn\'t.
Tom\'s parents were disappointed that he couldn\'t get into Harvard.
Tom asked Mary to teach him how to poach an egg in a microwave oven.
Tom wouldn\'t even give me a chance to explain why I did what I did.
While Tom is here, you might want to have him fix your leaky faucet.
Where on earth do you think that Tom is going at this time of night?
If Tom hadn\'t been working last weekend, he would\'ve gone fishing.
Tom knew he barely had enough money to buy everything he had to buy.
Tom knew that Mary was unlikely to want to go to the dance with him.
We all knew Tom was in trouble, but none of us did anything to help.
How long do you think it\'ll take you to finish writing this report?
Tom told Mary that she was the most beautiful woman he\'d ever seen.
Tom told me that he didn\'t recognize Mary the last time he saw her.
If you could travel to any country in the world, where would you go?
Many predictions were made, but none of those predictions came true.
Tom couldn\'t believe that Mary would really do something that dumb.
Mary tried to smuggle a hacksaw blade into the prison inside a cake.
Tom accomplished what we thought he wouldn\'t be able to accomplish.
It was obvious that Tom and Mary had strong feelings for each other.
It\'s important for the students to know what to expect on the test.
